page.title: 04RELIGION/EDUCATION
page.content:
houses, two restaurants and one cafe, also a service garage.
{RELIGION
Besides the Parish Church there are places of worship for the Catholics and Nonconformists. Each Church as its own burial ground.
{EDUCATION
The two schools in the Village, the Anglican(Brabin's Endowed School) and St Mary's Catholic School take care of the children's primary education, whilst the older children travel by bus to the two Comprehensive schools in the small town of Longridge some five miles south-west of Chipping.
The original Brabin's Endowned School
